```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
hla_info <- OptiTypeCallsHLA_20171207[,c(1,2,3,4,5,6,9)]
hla_info <- hla_info %>%
  .[substr(.$aliquot_id,14,15) %in% c("01", "02", "03", "04", "05", "06", "07", "08", "09"), ]
```

```{r}
tcr_info <- TCGA_mitcr_cdr3_result_1610082[TCGA_mitcr_cdr3_result_1610082$chain == "beta",c(1,11)]
```

```{r}
patient_id <- intersect(hla_info$aliquot_id, tcr_info$AliquotBarcode)
```

```{r}
colnames(hla_info)[7] <- "patient_id"
colnames(tcr_info)[1] <- "patient_id"
hla_info <- hla_info[hla_info$patient_id %in% patient_id, ]
tcr_info <- tcr_info[tcr_info$patient_id %in% patient_id, ]
```
